content:
Help agents deliver efficient and productive service experiences by adding classification to your flows. In addition to recommendations made on case creation, use a flow to get Einstein field predictions after a case is updated with new details to the Subject or Description.

Einstein Case Classification is available in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions. To add or use Case Classification in a flow requires:

* An active Einstein Case Classification model
* Automate Value enabled for any field you want to predict
* Only internal users can run a flow for Case Classification

Add the Einstein ApplyCaseClassificationRecommendations action to your flow to apply case classification to predict field values for a case. It takes a Case ID as input and outputs a case SObject with recommendations applied.

Add an Update Records action to save the ApplyCaseClassificationRecommendations case SObject output.
title: Einstein Case Classification for Flows
